channel.title: Freeze

item.title: Freeze
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50 && misc.random(2)==1){ if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 1540 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 2621 || plr.ProtMage) { plr.specGFX(395); hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(10); plr.EntangleDelay = 10; plr.sM("You Have Been Frozen"); plr.attackPlayersWithin2(395, 10, 10); } else if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 1540 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 2621) { plr.specGFX(395); plr.EntangleDelay = 10; plr.sM("You Have Been Frozen"); hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(50); }
